comments.content: I can't see any images or links...

I'm not sure what happened there, sorry...  
See this link: [https://twitter.com/hhpapazian/status/514046854187597825](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414160952/https:/twitter.com/hhpapazian/status/514046854187597825 "https://twitter.com/hhpapazian/status/514046854187597825")

hhp

Bespoke lettering? Note in particular the reverse emphasis in \_A\_ which makes it harmonize better with the \_V\_ next to it.  
Similar idea to Sweet Titling No. 22 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/sweet/titling-no-22/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414160952/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sweet/titling-no-22/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/sweet/titling-no-22/") which has fewer lines. Also note a sans version with a similar number of lines in Atlas [http://www.identifont.com/show?OCE](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414160952/http:/www.identifont.com/show?OCE "http://www.identifont.com/show?OCE")  
Don

Keith Hayden's [Benthem](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414160952/http:/www.behance.net/gallery/Benthem-Free-Typeface/4721555)

EDIT: thanks for the correction, Don :)

Good find Ryuk.  
Working link [https://www.behance.net/gallery/Benthem-Free-Typeface/4721555](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414160952/https:/www.behance.net/gallery/Benthem-Free-Typeface/4721555 "https://www.behance.net/gallery/Benthem-Free-Typeface/4721555")  
Don
